meanings.sent1: The phytochemically active compounds in the plant help protect it from pests.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the phytochemically rich properties of various herbs and vegetables.
meanings.sent3: The phytochemically enhanced soil made the plants grow like never before.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a phytochemically diverse paradise, attracting butterflies and bees.
meanings.sent5: The phytochemically altered leaves turned a vibrant shade of red in the fall.

meanings.definition: In a manner related to the study of plant chemicals.
meanings.sent1: The researchers analyzed the soil samples phytochemically to identify the plant species.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician tested the plant extract phytochemically to determine its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The chef added the herb phytochemically to enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The farmer sprayed the crops phytochemically to protect them from insects.
meanings.sent5: The students observed the plants phytochemically under the microscope during the experiment.
